Summary: watched the object not like a plane,helicopter or satellite
divs: sighting details looking out my parents window facing toward lake michigan in the east i saw this object. paid not much attention to it with the exception of the color. it was the deepest red\orange color that i have ever seen in the nightsky. went out side and watched it travel straight west toward my parents house way up in the sky. the rather airplane like slow path of the object continued to go through the summer triangle of stars. again like an airplane it slowly manuevered into a northern direction. i lost sight of it behind the trees. the color of the object remained steady with no blinkinglights. this may have been a sattelite, but i have seen satelites and the iss. the color is so different from those that i have observed and the time of visual was in a super long duration as to that of a satelite, flared or not. the object was slightly larger than venus. i continued to watch the skies and about 15 minutes later saw in the original flight path 2 of what appeared to be white circular shaped puffs of smoke miles apart from each other in the sky. i would like to say that i have observed fuel dumps from satelites in the night sky. there is a distinct wavy dissapation and trail effect. again this was so much more different, the puffs stayed circular in shape looming slightly larger before they faded out. i have scoured the internet for other obsevations unti this evening when a video appeared on a web site ufoglobalirc (u-tube, ufo caught in illinois on the aug.17th,2011) i understand there are a lot of experimental planes in flight these days. this video evidence compelled me to report this incidence as something unusual.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Midlothian
There were no other sightings in Midlothian on or around August 10th 2011
